trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Kingman
There were 3 other sightings in Kingman on or around August 4th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsLights were over the Peacock mtn. lots of people watching cars driving to get closer. Everyone was excited. Lights zooming back and forth, hovering, getting extremely bright, then dim. Like fighting or playing in the sky. One by one they got dim and moved off toward the north.
